current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text: To repeal the annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Uphold Our Promise to Veterans Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Uphold Our Promise to Veterans Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is hereby repealed.

header.#text: Repeal of annual adjustment of retired pay and retainer pay amounts for retired members of the Armed Forces under age 62
Foreign assistance to the Government of Egypt

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , shall refrain from providing to the Government of Egypt the assistance restricted under such section.

text.#text: In accordance with

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the United States Government, including the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 7008 of the Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Act, 2012
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Department of State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs Act, 2012/s:7008

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the following restrictions shall be in effect with respect to United States assistance to the Government of Egypt:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Uphold Our Promise to Veterans Act/s:3/ss:a/p:1

text.#text: In addition to the restrictions referred to in

Deliveries of defense articles currently slated for transfer to Egyptian Ministry of Defense (MOD) and Ministry of Interior (MOI) shall be suspended until the President certifies to Congress that democratic national elections have taken place in Egypt followed by a peaceful transfer of power.

Provision of defense services to Egyptian MOD and MOI shall be halted immediately until the President certifies to Congress that democratic national elections have taken place in Egypt followed by a peaceful transfer of power.

Processing of draft Letters of Offer and Acceptance (LOAs) for future arms sales to Egyptian MOD and MOI entities shall be halted until the President certifies to Congress that democratic national elections have taken place in Egypt followed by a peaceful transfer of power.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall be borne by the Government of Egypt.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Uphold Our Promise to Veterans Act/s:3/ss:a/p:2/sp:A..C
